comments: Great teacher, if you apply yourself you will get a good grade

This class is a nightmare. Do not take it if you are just looking for an easy A. The tests are on 14 chapters and you\'re expected to study the book and PP for each. The assignments each week are easy, the tests are just near impossible. Likely going to be my first C in college. Also, buy the book. The tests are only about half from the PPs.
I took this class online and there were two assignments and one quiz per week, each assignment only takes about twenty minutes. It\'s really a simple class.
Extremely easy class. Just come to class or make a friend who will go... He gives out all of the questions on the test, and doesn\'t change them at all.

This is an easy class. You don\'t actually have to learn anything or show up. If you do attend class, he gives you all of the questions that will be on the test. You watch a lot of Anthony Bordain clips from No Reservations.
Really nice guy. Book not really necessary. Attendance is not mandatory however he gives you all the test questions if you attend class.

GREAT TEACHER! Makes class so fun doesnt feel like class at all. He was very understanding when I had \'printer issues\' and let me email all my stuff to him. I\'m taking another class with him next semester just because its him.

He\'s awesome when it comes to teaching you in the kitchen just don\'t expect much in the classroom. That\'s why he brings in outside lectures like wine companies. LOVED HIM will take other classes with HIM!!!
